title: syllabus
text:
Topics

Floating point systems (properties, rounding, errors)
Systems of linear equation with error in the right-hand side, matrix norms, condition number.
Numerical solution of linear systems (LU,PLU,Cholesky)
Least square approximation.
Polynomial interpolation (Lagrange, Hermite, spline)
Numerical integration.
Numerical methods for solving of nonlinear equations and systems.
Optimization



Requirements for the practice grade

At most 3 absences from the labors.
There will a grading test at the end of the study period, and it will consist both numerical/multiple choice/matlab questions.
The grade will be determined by the following evaluation system:

0% - 50% \(\longrightarrow\) 1
50% - 70% \(\longrightarrow\) 2
70% - 85% \(\longrightarrow\) 3
85% - 95% \(\longrightarrow\) 4
95% -100% \(\longrightarrow\) 5

The exact date of the test will be announced on the e-learning site.
The retake will be held in the exam period.
The sample test collections on the e-learning site and the shared exercises on this site are serving as the basis for the grading test.
In the study period at the time of lectures there will be some extra tests. The points obtained by these tests can be used to increase your grading test’s result.

title: syllabus
text:
Topics

Floating point systems (properties, rounding, errors)
Systems of linear equation with error in the right-hand side, matrix norms, condition number.
Numerical solution of linear systems (LU,PLU,Cholesky)
Least square approximation.
Polynomial interpolation (Lagrange, Hermite, spline)
Numerical integration.
Eigenvalue problems, sparse systems.
Numerical solution of nonlinear equations and systems, minimization.
Linear programming (graphical and 1,2-phase simplex method) Duality in linear programming, sensitivity analysis. Algorithms for solving transportation and assignment problems.



Requirements for the practice grade

At most 3 absences from labors. At most 3 absences from practices. Note that the practice is mandatory.
There will a grading test at the end of the study period, and it will consist both numerical/multiple choice/matlab questions.
The grade will be determined by the following evaluation system:

0% - 50% \(\longrightarrow\) 1
50% - 70% \(\longrightarrow\) 2
70% - 85% \(\longrightarrow\) 3
85% - 95% \(\longrightarrow\) 4
95% -100% \(\longrightarrow\) 5

The exact date of the test will be announced on the e-learning site.
The retake will be held in the exam period.
The sample test collections on the e-learning site and the shared exercises on this site are serving as the basis for the grading test.
In the study period at the time of practices there will be some extra tests. The points obtained by these tests can be used to increase your grading test’s result.

title: contact
text:
you may want to contact me/or your mates through discord
here is the invite

you’ll land in the welcome channel
put your questions in the appropriate text channel
you can contact any member of this server through pm/dm

do not use offensive language, do not spread political/racial or other subjective views.

title: getting matlab
text:
matlab is a commercial (non-free) software
for the students/staff of our university local installation is or online usage is possible after registration
just follow this link
for the registration you should use your unideb related e-mail!
